name: Five Nights At The CoolDrDarkLord: at Freddy's
name_original: Five Nights At The CoolDrDarkLord: at Freddy's
description:
You get a new job as a nightguard in what seems like a standard hotel. But something feels strange about this one, and you cant seem to spot a single guest. 

At the end of the night, when you think you just might make it out of this creepy place, The time suddenly jumps back 6 hours and your night starts over.
